name: pixilate
caption: Pixilate

effect.short: Turns the bearer's []{type:normal} moves into []{type:fairy} moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
effect.full: Turns the bearer's []{type:normal}-type moves into []{type:fairy} moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.

flavorText:
Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.
